turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, is this Roundtable's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, you have reached Roundtable's Pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, do you have delivery available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes we have delivery available. Would you like to place an order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 2 large pizza's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of crust would you prefer on your pizzas? We have original and pan.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make both of them with pan crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings would you like on your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One one put pepperoni and mushrooms. The other anchovies, bell peppers, and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry, we do not have anchovies available at this time. Would you like to change the toppings on the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Put bell peppers, sausage, and olives on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order another pizza or any side dishes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me an order of Parmesan Twists and boneless wings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is a Caesar salad?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: An individual size Caesar salad is $5.49 while a family size Caesar salad is $7.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does it cost extra if I want more dressing on the side?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: An additional side of dressing will cost 49 cents.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's ok, I don't really want salad.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have 2 pizzas, parmesan twists and boneless wings, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order any drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh ya, how bout 2 2 liter pepsi's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 orders of 2 liter Pepsi's. Is there anything else you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order comes to $43.07. Your receipt will be sen to a text message and your delivery will arrive in roughly 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
